an10.4:1.1: Tatra kho ayasma sariputto bhikkhu amantesi …pe…
an10.4:1.5: Seyyathapi, avuso, rukkho sakhapalasavipanno. Tassa papatikapi na paripurim gacchati, tacopi … pheggupi … saropi na paripurim gacchati.
an10.4:1.6: Evamevam kho, avuso, dussilassa silavipannassa hatupaniso hoti avippatisaro;
an10.4:2.1: Silavato, avuso, silasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti avippatisaro;
an10.4:2.4: Seyyathapi, avuso, rukkho sakhapalasasampanno. Tassa papatikapi paripurim gacchati, tacopi … pheggupi … saropi paripurim gacchati.
an10.4:2.5: Evamevam kho, avuso, silavato silasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti avippatisaro;
